features.scheduleManagement: iSchedulEDU Schedule Management - Organize and access all your saved school schedules
features.scheduleAlerts: iSchedulEDU Schedule Alerts - Set up daily notifications for your class schedule
features.dailyTimeline: iSchedulEDU Daily Timeline View - See your complete school day schedule at a glance

features.experienceText: Experience the full power of iSchedulEDU with features like rotating block schedules, daily notifications, and easy schedule sharing. Perfect for teachers and administrators managing complex school timetables.

meta.title: iSchedulEDU - School Schedule Generator App | Easy Schedule Creation for Teachers
meta.description: Simplify your school scheduling with iSchedulEDU. Create custom schedules, manage A/B rotations, set up notifications, and share via QR codes. The perfect scheduling solution for teachers and school administrators.
